name: Hindi Calendar 2020
description: Hindi calendar 2020 app has high quality monthly images that allows you to view maasam, vaaram, thithi, and nakshatram information for all days in the year 2020 in Hindi. * Users can select any month by clicking left and right arrow buttons * Easy and Simple to use * Displays the list of festivals in Hindi for the every month. * Horoscope for 2019.We will update 2020 Horoscope soon. * Important Muhurt for year 2019.We will update 2020 Muhurt soon.
